calculations.name: Final Score
calculations.tableau_expression: IF  [Discount Tier]="Low Discont" THEN [Performance Code]+ 1 ELSE [Performance Code] END

calculation_context.Expression: IF  [Discount Tier]="Low Discont" THEN [Performance Code]+ 1 ELSE [Performance Code] END

calculated_fields.Discount Tier: IF [Discount Health]>0.25 THEN "High Discount" ELSEIF  [Discount Health]>0.10 THEN "Medium Discount" ELSE "Low Discont" END
calculated_fields.Performance Code: IF [Is High Performing ]="Yes" THEN [Quality Score ]+2 ELSE [Quality Score ]-1 END
